configureCommentStream.title: Configure Comment Stream
configureCommentStream.description: As an admin you may customize the settings for the comment stream for this asset
configureCommentStream.enablePremodDescription: Moderators must approve any comment before its published.
configureCommentStream.enablePremodLinksDescription: Moderators must approve any comment containing a link before its published.
configureCommentStream.enableQuestionBoxDescription: Commenters will see a question at the top of the comments stream.

configureCommentStream.title: Configurar los comentarios
configureCommentStream.description: Como Administrador puedes modificar las opciones de los comentarios en este artículo
configureCommentStream.enablePremodDescription: Los Moderadores deben aprobar cualquier comentario antes de su publicación
configureCommentStream.enablePremodLinksDescription: Los Moderadores deben probar cualquier comentario que contengan links antes de su publicación.
configureCommentStream.enableQuestionBoxDescription: Una pregunta estara en la parte de arriba del hilo de comentarios.
